title: What are the best songs composed by the Kannada music director Hamsalekha? - Quora

response.answer_text: Growing up listening to Hamsalekha’s eclectic music is one. Discovering Kannada film music through Hamsalekha is another. I belong to the second category. Not a native Kannadiga, I was introduced to the illustrious and much-underrated Kannada film music by friends and film aficionados. There was one constant factor in majority of the songs I found myself hooked to – the maverick musician Hamsalekha. Realizing his popularity, I confess to have derived the most out of my frequent taxi rides with Kannadiga drivers – who were more than happy to suggest me choicest of Hamsalekha tracks. Also a popular songwriter, Hamsalekha has also bagged awards for the same. Known to have changed the way Kannada film music sounded like, Hamsalekha is revered by music lovers across South India. So much so that he’s referred fondly by the title Naadha Brahma. Today, as Hamsalekha celebrates his birthday, here’s a list of 9 Hamsalekha songs that has caught the fancy of a migrant Malayali who still cannot really speak or understand Kannada too well but is hands-on with hundreds of songs. Here you go: Hamsalekha – The man who reinvented Kannada film music…
